images.title: Fresh Milk
images.prompt: Bottles of fresh milk in different sizes, arranged to emphasize their freshness and purity.

images.prompt: Various types of cheese and butter, arranged to showcase their rich textures and flavors.

images.title: Flavored Milk
images.prompt: Bottles of flavored milk, including chocolate, strawberry, and vanilla, arranged on a transparent background to emphasize their vibrant colors and refreshing taste.
